channel.title: Carn Llidi on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Carn Llidi
item.description: Coetan Arthur burial chamber on St Davids Head OK, same book used from the last walk , but this time it was walk no. 11:Â St David’s Head and Carn Llidi. You start off at Whitesands near St David which is convenient as there is lots of parking available - you will be charged parking if you come during the tourist season. The Carn Lidi hill is a prominent feature in southern Pembrokeshire and you can see it from miles away.
